AskHowManyWins.say: How many times do I have to beat you in rock paper scissors to be the ultimate winner?

AskUserChoice.say: I made my choice already, what's your choice? Rock, paper or scissors?
AskUserChoice.reprompt: what's your choice? rock, paper or scissors?

TiedResult.say: Oh! we tied on this one. Great minds think alike, they say. I'll beat you in the next round.

UserWins.say: Oh, you won this point! You have {userWins} wins and I have {alexaWins} wins.

AlexaWins.say: I won this point! You have {userWins} wins and I have {alexaWins} wins.

UserWinsTheGame.say: You won the game! congratulations, it was a great match.

Bye.say: That's all right, until next time!

Score.say: Here's the score. You: {userWins} wins, me: {alexaWins} wins. {wins} times needed to win the match.

NoScore.say: There's no score yet. Would you like to start a game?

AskIfRestart.say: The score right now is: Alexa {alexaWins}, you {userWins}. Are you sure you want to start a new game?

BigWinsNumber.say: {wins} is a big number, are you sure you want to play until one of us wins {wins} times?

Help.say: Hey there, this is a classic rock paper scissors game. You can start a new game, saying: 'start a new game'. You can get the score of the game, saying: 'score', 'my victories', 'who's winning', and things like that, you get the idea. If you feel I'm beating you (haha), at any time you can restart the game saying: let's play again.
